Hi! We’re Suits & Sandals. We make video games for fun!

Our Games

Ice Demon

Ice Demon is a simple, but very challenging arcade-style game of survival. Get points by defeating the endless army of Fire Demons that fall from the sky until you eventually get taken down. Try to get the highest scores you can!

Download More Info

Khimera: Destroy all Monster Girls

Part human, part oni, golem and harpy! The list goes on and on! Born in a lab, Chelshia the chimera is the world's first synthetic monster girl. When her monster inhabited island home is threatened by a band of looting pirates, she springs into action to save the day!

Download More Info

Mandew vs the Colorless Curse

Mandew has been trapped in a strange world void of colour and must fight his way out. Guided by the mysterious wizard trapped in light form, LengthenedMudTea, Mandew gathers the four golden consoles to open the way home. Could there be more to this mysterious world than meets the eye?

Download More Info

Mandew vs the Forever Rain

Mandew's fields are being flooded by a mysterious rainstorm thats been going on for weeks now. How can he plant all his delicious tomatoes and watermelon? Its up to him to investigate this phenomenon before it's too late.

Download More Info

Mandew vs the Upside Down Machine

Mandew is back again for another adventure. The city of Salsa (homeland of one of Mandew's previous enemies) has been uprooted and it's up to Mandew to save the day. Why does Mandew have to do it? Why not?

Download More Info

Throneless

Throneless is a fast paced beat-em-up platformer game. Play as Moon, an energetic and acrobatic lizard trained in hand to hand combat, and his best friend Robob, a robot that fires highly pressured water and explosive charge shots from a cannon on his back.

Download More Info

Vista Quest 2

The sequel to Vista Quest has you again fighting the forces of evil. This time a dark wizard has been harassing island residents and even threatening to revive the darkness you defeated in your past adventure. With trusty yo-yo and wall kicking ability, navigate 5 worlds filled with traps and enemies to save the day.

Download More Info

Vista Quest Pocket

The nearby island of Costa Vista has been taken over by the dark witch/sister of our favourite island hero! It's up to you to platform your way through 18 of the most wall-kickinest levels to date to save the island. Register on our forum to upload your final score when you beat the game.

Download More Info

Vista Quest

Vista Quest follows the story of an island resident on a quest to stop the invading evils from taking over his home. Play through 15 levels and face off against 4 bosses in S&S's first platformer!

Download More Info
